com.vmware.vcenter.system_config

Interface DeploymentType

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DeploymentTypeTypes, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DeploymentTypeStub

    public interface DeploymentType
extends Service, DeploymentTypeTypes
    The DeploymentType interface provides methods to get/set the type of the appliance. This interface was added in vSphere API 6.7.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.vmware.vcenter.system_config.DeploymentTypeTypes

        DeploymentTypeTypes.ConvergenceSpec, DeploymentTypeTypes.DomainInfo, DeploymentTypeTypes.Info, DeploymentTypeTypes.PscInfo, DeploymentTypeTypes.ReconfigureSpec

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.vmware.vcenter.system_config.DeploymentTypeTypes

        _VAPI_SERVICE_ID

    • Method Detail

      • get

        DeploymentTypeTypes.Info get()
        Get the type of the vCenter appliance. This method was added in vSphere API 6.7.

        Synchronous method overload. Result of the invocation will be reported as a method return value.

        Returns:
        The type of the vCenter appliance.
        Throws:
        Unauthenticated - if the caller is not authenticated.
        NotAllowedInCurrentState - if appliance is not in CONFIGURED state.

      • get

        DeploymentTypeTypes.Info get(InvocationConfig invocationConfig)
        Get the type of the vCenter appliance. This method was added in vSphere API 6.7.

        Synchronous method overload. Result of the invocation will be reported as a method return value. Use invocationConfig to specify configuration for this particular invocation.

        Parameters:
        invocationConfig - Configuration for the method invocation.
        Returns:
        The type of the vCenter appliance.
        Throws:
        Unauthenticated - if the caller is not authenticated.
        NotAllowedInCurrentState - if appliance is not in CONFIGURED state.

        void get(AsyncCallback<DeploymentTypeTypes.Info> asyncCallback)
        Get the type of the vCenter appliance. This method was added in vSphere API 6.7.

        Asynchronous method overload. Result of the invocation will be reported via the specified asyncCallback.

        Invocation Result:
        The type of the vCenter appliance.

        Operation Errors:
        Unauthenticated - if the caller is not authenticated.
        NotAllowedInCurrentState - if appliance is not in CONFIGURED state.

        Parameters:
        asyncCallback - Receives the status (progress, result or error) of the operation invocation.

      • reconfigure

        void reconfigure(DeploymentTypeTypes.ReconfigureSpec spec)
        Reconfigure the type of the vCenter appliance. This method was added in vSphere API 6.7.

        Synchronous method overload. Result of the invocation will be reported as a method return value.

        Parameters:
        spec - ReconfigureSpec to set the appliance type.
        Throws:
        Unsupported - if the appliance is in CONFIGURED state and if not changing the type from VCSA_EMBEDDED to VCSA_EXTERNAL.
        InvalidArgument - if passed arguments are invalid.
        Unauthenticated - if the caller is not authenticated.
        Unauthenticated - if external PSC credentials are not valid.
        NotAllowedInCurrentState - if the appliance is not in INITIALIZED or CONFIGURED state.

      • reconfigure

        void reconfigure(DeploymentTypeTypes.ReconfigureSpec spec,
               InvocationConfig invocationConfig)
        Reconfigure the type of the vCenter appliance. This method was added in vSphere API 6.7.

        Synchronous method overload. Result of the invocation will be reported as a method return value. Use invocationConfig to specify configuration for this particular invocation.

        Parameters:
        spec - ReconfigureSpec to set the appliance type.
        invocationConfig - Configuration for the method invocation.
        Throws:
        Unsupported - if the appliance is in CONFIGURED state and if not changing the type from VCSA_EMBEDDED to VCSA_EXTERNAL.
        InvalidArgument - if passed arguments are invalid.
        Unauthenticated - if the caller is not authenticated.
        Unauthenticated - if external PSC credentials are not valid.
        NotAllowedInCurrentState - if the appliance is not in INITIALIZED or CONFIGURED state.

      • convertToVcsaEmbedded_Task

        java.lang.String convertToVcsaEmbedded_Task(DeploymentTypeTypes.ConvergenceSpec spec)
        Convert the type of the vCenter appliance to vCSA embedded. This method was added in vSphere API 6.7.2.

        Synchronous method overload. Result of the invocation is a task identifier which will be returned by this method.

        Parameters:
        spec - ConvergenceSpec to provide all needed information for convergence operation.
        Returns:
        identifier for the task created by this API invocation
        Throws:
        Unsupported - if the appliance is in not a management node.
        InvalidArgument - if passed arguments are invalid.
        Unauthenticated - if the caller is not authenticated.
        NotAllowedInCurrentState - if the appliance is already an embedded node.

      • convertToVcsaEmbedded_Task

        java.lang.String convertToVcsaEmbedded_Task(DeploymentTypeTypes.ConvergenceSpec spec,
                                          InvocationConfig invocationConfig)
        Convert the type of the vCenter appliance to vCSA embedded. This method was added in vSphere API 6.7.2.

        Synchronous method overload. Result of the invocation is a task identifier which will be returned by this method. Use invocationConfig to specify configuration for this particular invocation.

        Parameters:
        spec - ConvergenceSpec to provide all needed information for convergence operation.
        invocationConfig - Configuration for the method invocation.
        Returns:
        identifier for the task created by this API invocation
        Throws:
        Unsupported - if the appliance is in not a management node.
        InvalidArgument - if passed arguments are invalid.
        Unauthenticated - if the caller is not authenticated.
        NotAllowedInCurrentState - if the appliance is already an embedded node.

      • convertToVcsaEmbedded_Task

        void convertToVcsaEmbedded_Task(DeploymentTypeTypes.ConvergenceSpec spec,
                              AsyncCallback<java.lang.String> asyncCallback)
        Convert the type of the vCenter appliance to vCSA embedded. This method was added in vSphere API 6.7.2.

        Asynchronous method overload. Result of the invocation which is a task identifier will be reported via the specified asyncCallback.

        Invocation Result:
        identifier for the task created by this API invocation

        Operation Errors:
        Unsupported - if the appliance is in not a management node.
        InvalidArgument - if passed arguments are invalid.
        Unauthenticated - if the caller is not authenticated.
        NotAllowedInCurrentState - if the appliance is already an embedded node.

        Parameters:
        spec - ConvergenceSpec to provide all needed information for convergence operation.
        asyncCallback - Receives the status (progress, result or error) of the operation invocation.

      • convertToVcsaEmbedded_Task

        void convertToVcsaEmbedded_Task(DeploymentTypeTypes.ConvergenceSpec spec,
                              AsyncCallback<java.lang.String> asyncCallback,
                              InvocationConfig invocationConfig)
        Convert the type of the vCenter appliance to vCSA embedded. This method was added in vSphere API 6.7.2.

        Asynchronous method overload. Result of the invocation which is a task identifier will be reported via the specified asyncCallback. Use invocationConfig to specify configuration for this particular invocation.

        Invocation Result:
        identifier for the task created by this API invocation

        Operation Errors:
        Unsupported - if the appliance is in not a management node.
        InvalidArgument - if passed arguments are invalid.
        Unauthenticated - if the caller is not authenticated.
        NotAllowedInCurrentState - if the appliance is already an embedded node.

        Parameters:
        spec - ConvergenceSpec to provide all needed information for convergence operation.
        asyncCallback - Receives the status (progress, result or error) of the operation invocation.
        invocationConfig - Configuration for the method invocation.
